{"step_by_step_thinking": "The mandibular first molar is a tooth in the lower jaw. An extra distal root in this tooth is known as Radix Entomolaris. Radix Paramolaris refers to an extra root on the buccal side of a molar, and Tomt's root is not a recognized term in dental anatomy.", "answer_choice": "B. Radix entomolaris"}
